H0.text: Matt Busby played for Manchester City from 1928 to 1936. Which club did he play for from 1936 to 1941. Liverpool

H1.text: Matt Busby played for Manchester City from 1928 to 1936. Which club did he play for from 1936 to 1941. Bolton Wanderers

H2.text: Matt Busby played for Manchester City from 1928 to 1936. Which club did he play for from 1936 to 1941. Everton

H3.text: Matt Busby played for Manchester City from 1928 to 1936. Which club did he play for from 1936 to 1941. Lerpwl

A4.text: Busby was sold to Liverpool for £8,000 on 12 March 1936, having made more than 200 appearances for Manchester City.

A5.text: Busby made his debut for Liverpool on 14 March 1936, away to Huddersfield Town; the match ended in a 1–0 Liverpool defeat.
